Service Details: - Offers a free voice therapy group- Strengthening your voice with music is known to assist voices weakened from Parkinson’s Disease, stroke, neurological disorders, or aging
Cost: There is no charge to attend the meetings
Meetings: Every Tue, 1:00pm - 2:30pm @ Seventh Day Adventist Church Hall (1130 Springfield Rd, Kelowna (corner of Springfield Rd and Gordon Dr))
